attributes.action: To pull all of the troops out of Iraq for the good of the country (both ours and Iraq)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pull all of the troops out of iraq. As this is causing a deficiency for britain as if an attack was carried out here we will be unable to protect ourselves using only our own forces

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
